classic.question: Question
classic.easterEgg: You got them all right! You are Jordi Hurtado's secondary account.

home.title: Welcome to WIQ!
home.classicDescription: In Classic mode, you will have to answer a set number of questions within a limited time. Show off your knowledge and speed to overcome this challenge!
home.wisebatteryDescription: In Wise Battery mode, you will test your knowledge by answering as many questions as you can within a fixed time. The more questions you get right, the better your score! Are you ready for this timed challenge?
home.humancalculatorDescription: In Human Calculator mode, you will have to solve mathematical operations within a limited time. Showcase your math skills and speed to overcome this challenge!
home.error: There was an error loading the questions. Please try again later.

help.title: Help Center
help.description: Welcome to our application's help center. Here you'll find useful information to make the most out of our game.
help.gameModesDescription: In our application, we have 3 game modes to entertain you. In this section, we aim to address all your doubts.
help.socialHelpDescription: We have different ways to interact with other users. If you have any doubts about how to do it, this is your section.
help.statsHelpDescription: We have a mode to check all the statistics. If you have any doubts, this is your section.

helpGame.title: Help: Game Modes
helpGame.description: Our application features 3 game modes where you can entertain yourself as much as you want and strive to achieve the highest score. All of them follow the same structure: they present four answer options, out of which only one is correct. Below, we'll detail each game mode and provide a brief example of how they work.
helpGame.classicDescription: In Classic mode, you'll have to answer a series of questions within a set time limit for each question.  There's also a time bar indicating the remaining time. Correct answers are highlighted in green, while incorrect ones are marked in red.
helpGame.sabiosDescription: In the Wisdom Battery mode, you need to correctly answer as many questions as possible within a limited time.
helpGame.calculatorDescription: In Human Calculator mode, you'll tackle mathematical operations, as many as you can until you fail.

helpSocial.title: Help: Social
helpSocial.description: Our application has a Social section where you can share your gaming experience with other users.
helpSocial.description2: You can search for users in the system and add them as friends to easily access their profile.
helpSocial.description3: You can create or join an existing group with other users to access their profile and recent games.
